00001 /* vmedrv.h */
00002 /* VME device driver for Bit3 Model 617/618/620 on Linux 2.6.x */
00003 /* Created by Enomoto Sanshiro on 28 November 1999. */
00004 /* Last updated by Enomoto Sanshiro on 20 February 2009. */
00005 
00006 
00007 #ifndef __VMEDRV_H__
00008 #define __VMEDRV_H__
00009 
00010 #include <linux/ioctl.h>
00011 
00012 
00013 typedef enum vmedrv_access_modes_t {
00014     VMEDRV_A16D16,
00015     VMEDRV_A16D32,
00016     VMEDRV_A24D16,
00017     VMEDRV_A24D32,
00018     VMEDRV_A32D16,
00019     VMEDRV_A32D32,
00020     vmedrv_NUMBER_OF_ACCESS_MODES
00021 } vmedrv_access_mode_t;
00022 
00023 
00024 typedef enum vmedrv_transfer_methods_t {
00025     VMEDRV_PIO,           /* programmed access */
00026     VMEDRV_DMA,           /* direct memory access */
00027     VMEDRV_NBDMA,         /* non-blocking DMA */
00028     vmedrv_NUMBER_OF_TRANSFER_METHODS
00029 } vmedrv_transfer_methods_t;
00030 
00031 
00032 /* 0 or negative signal_id is used to indicate wait-for-interrupt */
00033 /* timeout is used only for wait-for-interrupt */
00034 typedef struct vmedrv_interrupt_property_t {
00035     int irq;
00036     int vector;
00037     int signal_id;
00038     int timeout;
00039     int vector_mask;
00040 } vmedrv_interrupt_property_t;
00041 
00042 
00043 typedef struct vmedrv_word_access_t {
00044     unsigned long address;
00045     unsigned long data;
00046 } vmedrv_word_access_t;

00049 #define VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC 0xB3
00050 
00051 #define VMEDRV_IOC_SET_ACCESS_MODE            _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 1, int)
00052 #define VMEDRV_IOC_SET_TRANSFER_METHOD        _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 2, int)
00053 #define VMEDRV_IOC_REGISTER_INTERRUPT         _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 3, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00054 #define VMEDRV_IOC_UNREGISTER_INTERRUPT       _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 4, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00055 #define VMEDRV_IOC_ENABLE_INTERRUPT           _IO(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 5)
00056 #define VMEDRV_IOC_DISABLE_INTERRUPT          _IO(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 6)
00057 #define VMEDRV_IOC_ENABLE_ERROR_INTERRUPT     _IO(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 7)
00058 #define VMEDRV_IOC_DISABLE_ERROR_INTERRUPT    _IO(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 8)
00059 #define VMEDRV_IOC_WAIT_FOR_INTERRUPT         _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 9, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00060 #define VMEDRV_IOC_CHECK_INTERRUPT            _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 10, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00061 #define VMEDRV_IOC_CLEAR_INTERRUPT            _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 11, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00062 #define VMEDRV_IOC_PROBE                      _IOWR(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 12, vmedrv_word_access_t)
00063 #define VMEDRV_IOC_SET_INTERRUPT_AUTODISABLE  _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 13, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00064 #define VMEDRV_IOC_SET_VECTOR_MASK            _IOW(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 14, vmedrv_interrupt_property_t)
00065 #define VMEDRV_IOC_RESET_ADAPTER              _IO(VMEDRV_IOC_MAGIC, 15)
